verbs.description: [V: impd] investigating deadly hit - and - run on near north side police are looking for the driver that hit and killed a young woman on the near north side emergency crews were called to the area of n meridian st and 34th st around 9 30 p m police say an indygo bus had just dropped off passengers on meridian just north of 34th street one of the passengers was crossing the road when a red car traveling the opposite direction hit her and took off indianapolis charger challenger near north side ind
